meanings.definition: Wooden objects or utensils used for eating or cooking.
meanings.sent1: I bought a set of treenware for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The treenware in the kitchen adds a rustic touch to the decor.
meanings.sent3: The treenware started dancing on the table when the music played.
meanings.sent4: Her treenware collection was a forest of spoons and forks.
meanings.sent5: The treenware gleamed in the sunlight, inviting us to dine outdoors.

meanings.definition: Items made of wood, especially for household use.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's treenware includes beautifully carved bowls.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a display of treenware from the 1800s.
meanings.sent3: The treenware whispered secrets of the olden days to anyone who listened.
meanings.sent4: The treenware stood like silent guardians in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The treenware smelled of pine, reminding me of the forest.
